snippet: In a further sign of weakness in the European economy, the jobless rate in the euro zone increased in March to a record 12.1 percent.
abstract: Eurostate reports that unemployment rate in 17-nation euro zone has hit new high, rising to a record 12.1 percent in March; figures are a further sign of weakness in the European economy, indicating that it is healing more slowly than many had hoped.
lead_paragraph: In a further sign of weakness in the European economy, the jobless rate in the euro zone increased in March to a record 12.1 percent.

headline.seo: Euro Zone Jobless Rate Hits Another Record
headline.main: Unemployment in Euro Zone Continues to Rise
headline.print_headline: In Continuing Sign of Weakness, Unemployment Hits New High in the Euro Zone
